code: export default function validateValue(value,type){var isValid=true;switch(type){case'alpha':isValid=/^[a-zA-Z-,]+(\s{0,1}[a-zA-Z-, ])*$/.test(value);break;case'dni':isValid=/^(?=.*\d).{5,}$/.test(value);break;case'phone':isValid=/^\(?([0-9]{8})\)?$/.test(value);break;case'email':isValid=/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(value);break;default:console.log('inpu type not supported');break;}return isValid;}
